name: Lockdownyourlife (@Lockdownyourlife@infosec.exchange)
summary:
A friendly reminder to set-up Google alerts for yourself, your family, your business, your trademarks, so that in case of a data breach, harassment, stalking, NCP, or even rumors/crisis, you get notification & can handle accordingly.

#googlealerts #google #reminder #MorningMeditation #infosec #techie #safety #InformationSecurity #privacy #business #coffee
